title: Stephane Lambiel on Lausanne 2020, Shoma Uno, and music
description: It’s day one of the Winter Youth Olympic Games. Olympic silver medallist Stephane Lambiel gave us his opinion on who to look out for and opened up about his new coaching link up with Japanese figure skater and Olympic silver medallist Shoma Uno. Plus, some other athletes to look out for and we chat to Lausanne 2020 Olympic medal designer Zakea Page.
